attributes.action: SAVE 23,000 UK LIVES P.A.FROM NOX POISONING CAUSED BY EMISSION CHEATING TRUCKERS
attributes.additional_details:
THERE IS THE TECHNOLOGY AVAILABLE NOW TO DEAL WITH THE PROBLEM. IT IS ROLLING ROADS. 
ADMITTEDLY EXPENSIVE AT £100K A POT, BUT HOW MUCH ARE 23,000 LIVES WORTH, I WOULD SAY MUCH MORE THAN THE £10 MILLION THAT IT WOULD COST TO PUT IN PLACE 100 ROLLING ROADS.
 
WHY ARE WE PREPARED TO ACCEPT THE HIGHEST NOX LEVELS IN EUROPE?

ANY OPERATOR CAUGHT ATTEMPTING TO CIRCUMNAVIGATE EMISSION STANDARDS SHOULD HAVE HIS OPERATOR LICENSE RESCINDED IMMEDIATELY. 

AT THE MOMENT ANYONE CAUGHT IS GIVEN A WARNING AND TOLD TO PUT THE VEHICLE RIGHT - WHAT KIND OF ENFORCEMENT IS THAT??
attributes.background:
AS REVEALED THIS EVENING ON CH 4 DESPATCHES TODAY, OUR GOVERNMENT IS QUITE HAPPY TO SACRIFICE 23,000 LIVES A YEAR IN SPITE OF KNOWING ABOUT DIESELGATE.
THIS IS SCANDALOUS.
